response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value to both of us. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations, is priced at $1,150,000.

Given its exceptional quality and the significant benefits it offers, I believe this is an excellent investment for you. By accepting this offer, you not only secure a valuable asset but also benefit from the unique features that set this product apart in the market.

Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I am more than happy to provide additional details to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
